summary.span: Encapsulates the data source for a form.

span.span: Encapsulates the data source for a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件有许多用途。The component serves many purposes. 首先，它通过提供货币管理、 更改通知和 Windows 窗体控件与数据源之间的其他服务简化将控件绑定到数据窗体上。First, it simplifies binding controls on a form to data by providing currency management, change notification, and other services between Windows Forms controls and data sources. 这可以通过附加组件为数据源使用属性。This is accomplished by attaching the component to your data source using the property. 对于复杂绑定方案，您可以选择设置到特定列或列表数据源中的属性。For complex binding scenarios you can optionally set the property to a specific column or list in the data source. 您然后将控件绑定到。You then bind controls to the . 数据的所有进一步交互都通过调用到组件。All further interaction with the data is accomplished with calls to the component. 有关如何在示例可简化绑定过程，请参阅[如何： Windows 窗体控件绑定到 DBNull 数据库值](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md)和[如何： 处理错误和使用数据绑定该发生的异常](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md).For examples on how the can simplify the binding process, see [How to: Bind Windows Forms Controls to DBNull Database Values](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md) and [How to: Handle Errors and Exceptions that Occur with Databinding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md). 导航和更新的数据源通过实现方法如， ，和。Navigation and updating of the data source is accomplished through methods such as , , and . 通过处理排序和筛选等操作和属性。Operations such as sorting and filtering are handled through the and properties. 有关详细信息使用的排序和筛选与，请参阅[如何： 进行排序和筛选器使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 组件的 ADO.NET 数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md)。For more information on using sorting and filtering with the , see [How to: Sort and Filter ADO.NET Data with the Windows Forms BindingSource Component](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md). 此外，组件可以充当强类型化的数据源。In addition, the component can act as a strongly typed data source. 通常在基础数据源的类型是通过以下机制之一已修复：Typically the type of the underlying data source is fixed through one of the following mechanisms: - 使用方法添加到项组件。Use the method to add an item to the component. - 设置到列表中，单个对象或类型的属性。Set the property to a list, single object, or type. 这两种机制创建强类型列表。Both of these mechanisms create a strongly-typed list. 有关如何使用的详细信息若要将绑定到一个类型，请参阅[如何： 将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到类型](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md)。For more information on how to use the to bind to a type, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Type](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md). 此外可以使用将控件绑定到 factory 对象。You can also use the to bind your controls to a factory object. 有关如何执行此操作的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到 Factory 对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md)。For more information on how to do this, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Factory Object](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md). > [!NOTE] > 因为句柄这两个简单和复杂数据源，术语会产生问题。Because a handles both simple and complex data sources, terminology is problematic. 在此类文档，术语*列表*指的是托管的数据源中的数据集合并*项*表示单个元素。Within this class documentation, the term *list* refers to a data collection within the hosted data source, and *item* denotes a single element. 当讨论功能关联到复杂的数据源等效术语*表*并*行*使用。When discussing functionality associated with complex data sources, the equivalent terms *table* and *row* are used. 提供用于访问基础数据成员。 provides members for accessing the underlying data. 可以通过检索当前项属性，然后将整个列表可以检索通过属性。The current item can be retrieved through the property, and the entire list can be retrieved through the property. 支持对当前项通过编辑操作并， ，并和方法。Editing operations are supported on the current item through and the , , and and methods. 尽管货币管理自动处理所有基础数据源类型，此类公开的大量事件，如和，允许自定义。Although currency management is handled automatically for all underlying data source types, this class exposes a number of events, such as and , that allow for customization. 绑定到的数据源组件也可以导航和管理与类，该类用于导航列表中的项提供类似于 VCR 的用户界面 (UI)。Data sources that are bound to a component can also be navigated and managed with the class, which provides a VCR-like user interface (UI) for navigating items within a list. 尽管可以绑定到任何数据源，它的设计与集成组件通过其属性。Although can be bound to any data source, it was designed to integrate with a component through its property. 默认属性类是。The default property for the class is . 默认事件是。The default event is . > [!CAUTION] > 成员的许多类对表示的基础列表属性，并且只引用基础列表对其操作。Many of the members of the class operate on the underlying list represented by the property and simply refer their operation to the underlying list. 因此，当绑定到的自定义实现，这些成员的具体行为可能不同于文档中所述的行为。Therefore, when the is bound to a custom implementation of , the exact behavior of these members may differ from the behavior described in the class documentation. 例如，方法调用。For example, the method calls . 文档介绍方法，并介绍该基础方法正确实现。The documentation describes the method with the understanding that the method for the underlying is correctly implemented. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示绑定到。The following code example demonstrates a bound to a . 绑定到包含字体的列表。The is bound to a that contains a list of fonts. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT/CS/Form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT/VB/Form1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新对象添加到表示的基础列表之前发生的事件属性。The event occurs before a new object is added to the underlying list represented by the property. 此事件触发后调用方法时，但在之前创建新项并将其添加到基础列表中。This event is fired after the method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the underlying list. 通过处理此事件时，程序员可以提供自定义项的创建和插入行为，无需强制派生类。By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the class. 实现这一点在事件处理程序通过设置属性的参数的新项。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在中创建的新对象事件必须属于与包含在列表中的类型相同的类型或将出现异常。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 不能设置属性绑定到时或因为不能添加一个新到列表。You cannot set the property when bound to a or because you cannot add a new to the list. 提供新的自定义项功能的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用组件绑定到列表控件。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 向列表添加新项事件处理程序。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新项添加到表示的基础列表属性。The method adds a new item to the underlying list represented by the property. 此方法设置了以下一系列操作：This method sets up the following series of actions: 1. 自动调用方法以提交任何挂起的编辑操作。The method is automatically called to commit any pending edit operations. 2. 自动引发事件。The event is automatically raised. 可以以编程方式处理此事件来构造新的项。This event can be programmatically handled to construct the new item. 实现这一点在事件处理程序通过设置属性的参数的新项。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在中创建的新对象事件必须属于与包含在列表中的类型相同的类型或将出现异常。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 如果不处理事件，并且基础列表是，则该请求将传递给此列表的方法。If the event is not handled, and the underlying list is an , then the request is passed to the list's method. 如果基础列表不是 ，则通过该项的公共默认构造函数自动创建该项。If the underlying list is not an , the item is automatically created through its public default constructor. 在任一情况下，新项添加到列表的末尾。In either case, the new item is added to the end of the list. 3. 新项立即添加到内部列表除非数据源实现接口。The new item is added immediately to the internal list unless the data source implements the interface. 在这种情况下，新的项才会提交到的显式调用由或直到启动新的列表操作。In this case, the new item is not committed until an explicit call to is made or until a new list operation is initiated. 它是已提交之前，新项可以回滚通过调用，在这种情况下新项将被丢弃。Before it is committed, the new item can be rolled back by calling , in which case the new item is discarded. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用组件绑定到列表控件。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 向列表添加新项事件处理程序。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为属性依赖于基础数据源类型。The default value for the property depends on the underlying data source type. 如果基础列表实现接口，此属性将委托给基础列表。If the underlying list implements the interface, this property will delegate to the underlying list. 否则，此属性将返回`false`如果基础列表具有任何以下特征：Otherwise, this property will return `false` if the underlying list has any of the following characteristics: - 它具有固定的大小，由属性。It has a fixed size, as determined by the property. - 它是只读的由属性。It is read-only, as determined by the property. - 项的类型没有默认构造函数。The item's type does not have a default constructor. > [!NOTE] > 一旦设置此属性的值，getter 将不再引用对基础列表的调用。Once the value of this property is set, the getter no longer refers the call to the underlying list. 相反，它只是返回直到以前设置的值调用方法。Instead, it simply returns the value that was previously set until the method is called. 设置此属性将引发具有事件设置为。Setting this property raises the event with set to . 如果您设置属性设置为`true`和基础列表类型没有默认构造函数，则必须处理事件并创建适当的类型。If you set the property to `true` and the underlying list type does not have a default constructor, you must handle the event and create the appropriate type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用的属性组件，以允许用户添加新项添加至组件的基础列表。The following code example demonstrates using the property of the component to permit the user to add new items to the component's underlying list. 此属性设置为`true`使绑定控件来显示新记录所在的行。Setting this property to `true` causes the bound control to display its row for new records. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时属性更改的任何原因如下：The event is raised whenever the property changes for any of the following reasons: - 当前位置更改。The current position of the changes. - 或属性更改。The or properties change. - 基础的成员身份发生更改，这将导致来指代不同的项。The membership of the underlying changes, which causes to refer to a different item. 示例包括添加或删除一个项之前的当前项，删除或移动的当前项本身，或将项移到当前的位置。Examples include adding or deleting an item before the current item, deleting or moving the current item itself, or moving an item to the current position. - 基础列表是通过新的排序和筛选操作来刷新。The underlying list is refreshed by a new sorting or filtering operation. 触发此事件后，属性将包含它的新值。When this event is triggered, the property will already contain its new value. 是的默认事件类。 is the default event for the class. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为多个数据源，包括类型、 对象和类型的列表。The property can be set to a number of data sources, including types, objects, and lists of types. 产生的数据源将公开为一个列表。The resulting data source will be exposed as a list. 下表显示了一些常见的数据源和生成的列表计算。The following table shows some of the common data sources and the resulting list evaluation. |数据源属性DataSource property|列表结果List results| |-------------------------|------------------| |`null`|一个空的对象。An empty of objects. 将项添加到所添加项的类型设置的列表。Adding an item sets the list to the type of the added item.| |`null` 使用设置`null` with set|不受支持，将引发。Not supported, raises .| |非列表类型或者"T"类型的对象Non-list type or object of type "T"|空的"T"类型。Empty of type "T".| |数组实例Array instance| 包含数组元素。 containing the array elements.| | 实例 instance|包含项。An containing the items.| |列出"T"的包含类型的实例List instance containing type "T"| 包含"T"类型的实例。 instance containing type "T".| 此外，可以设置为其他列表类型如并和将适当地处理。In addition, can be set to other list types such as and and the will handle them appropriately. 在这种情况下，在列表中包含的类型应具有默认构造函数。In this case, the type contained in the list should have a default constructor. 设置数据源时，如果提供的引用包含多个列表或表，必须设置属性设置为一个字符串，指定要绑定到的列表。When setting a data source, if the supplied reference contains more than one list or table, you must set the property to a string that specifies the list to bind to. 设置此属性将引发事件。Setting this property raises the event. > [!NOTE] > 如果您进行任何更改到属性值，则应上进行用户界面 (UI) 线程，以确保 UI 反映所做的更改。If you make any changes to the property value, you should do so on the user interface (UI) thread to ensure that the UI reflects the changes. 属性是默认属性类。The property is the default property for the class. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将通知所有控件绑定到刷新它们的值。The method informs all controls bound to the to refresh their values. 该方法执行此通过引发至少一次事件;`metaDataChanged`参数指示基础更改的性质。The method does this by raising the event at least once; the `metaDataChanged` parameter indicates the nature of the underlying change. - 一个`metaDataChanged`的值`true`指示的数据架构已更改。A `metaDataChanged` value of `true` indicates that the data schema of has changed. 一个事件以产生设置为。A event is raised with set to . - 一个`metaDataChanged`的值`false`指示，只有一个或多个项的值已更改。A `metaDataChanged` value of `false` indicates that only the values of one or more items have changed. 而不考虑的值`metaDataChanged`、 一个与引发事件设置为。Regardless of the value of `metaDataChanged`, a event is raised with set to . 因此，调用使用的参数`true`将引发两个事件。As a consequence, calling with a parameter of `true` will raise two events. 每当另一个成员对数据绑定，例如设置所做的重大更改都会自动调用或属性。 is automatically called whenever another member makes major changes to the data-binding, such as setting the or properties. 但是，编程人员还可以显式调用此方法。However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用组件绑定的数组列表，其中未提供更改通知。The following code example uses a component to bind an array list, which does not provide change notification. 从列表中移除项和更改的通知绑定的控件，应调用方法。An item is removed from the list, and the bound controls are notified of the change by calling the method. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 BindingSource 的 Windows 窗体控件中反映数据源更新](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Reflect Data Source Updates in a Windows Forms Control with the BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResumeBinding() cil managed

summary.span: Resumes data binding.

span.span: Resumes data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允许在一个简单的绑定方案中使用临时挂起和继续数据绑定的两种方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario. 如果必须允许用户对数据字段进行一些编辑之前进行验证，则通常会挂起数据绑定。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 例如，如果必须将一个字段更改时根据第二个，但验证第一个字段会导致将在错误中的第二个字段。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用防止更改推送到数据源之前调用，但实际上不能阻止任何事件发生。Using prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 使用如下所示复杂数据绑定的控件控件，如基于更改事件其值更新事件，因此调用不会阻止它们接收到数据源的更改。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event, so calling will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source. 出于此原因，这并设计用于简单绑定控件，如控件。For this reason, this and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者你可以使用这些方法在复杂绑定方案中，则禁止显示如果通过设置事件属性设置为`false`。Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`.

summary.span: Gets or sets the column names used for sorting, and the sort order for viewing the rows in the data source.

span.span: A case-sensitive string containing the column name followed by "ASC" (for ascending) or "DESC" (for descending).

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个区分大小写的字符串，指定用于排序的行，以及排序方向的列名称。The property is a case-sensitive string that specifies the column names used to sort the rows, along with the sort direction. 默认情况下，列按升序排序。Columns are sorted ascending by default. 多个列可以用逗号分隔，如`"State, ZipCode DESC"`。Multiple columns can be separated by commas, such as `"State, ZipCode DESC"`. 若要支持排序，基础列表必须实现或接口。To support sorting, the underlying list must implement the or interfaces. 此功能可通过查询属性。This capability can be queried through the property. 多列进行排序时，才可用属性是`true`。Multicolumn sorting is available when the property is `true`. 设置属性将更改内部的列表，具体取决于它的类型：Setting the property will change the internal list depending on its type: - 如果列表的类型，则和的内部列表中设置属性。If the list is of type , the and properties are set in the internal list. - 如果列表的类型，则属性设置。If the list is of type , the property is set. 不排序字符串时，才会更改内部列表的排序属性`null`。The internal list's sort properties are only changed when the sort string is not `null`. `get`此属性访问器不会检索内部列表的排序值; 相反，它将返回`set`访问器值。The `get` accessor for this property will not retrieve the sort value of the internal list; instead, it will return the `set` accessor value. 值属性将保留在数据源更改时。The value of the property will persist when the data source changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来执行基本排序。The following example shows how to use the property to perform basic sorting with a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体并调用`PopulateDataViewAndSort`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndSort` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 你的窗体应导入和命名空间。Your form should import the and namespaces. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods/VB/Form1.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来执行高级排序与。The following example shows how to use the property to perform advanced sorting with a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体并调用`PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 你的窗体应导入和命名空间。Your form should import the and namespaces. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SuspendBinding() cil managed

summary.span: Suspends data binding to prevent changes from updating the bound data source.

span.span: Suspends data binding to prevent changes from updating the bound data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允许在一个简单的绑定方案中使用临时挂起和继续数据绑定的两种方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario. 如果必须允许用户对数据字段进行一些编辑之前进行验证，则通常会挂起数据绑定。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 例如，如果必须将一个字段更改时根据第二个，但验证第一个字段会导致将在错误中的第二个字段。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用，并防止更改推送到数据源之前调用，但实际上不能阻止任何事件发生。Using and prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 使用如下所示复杂数据绑定的控件控件，如基于更改事件其值更新事件，因此调用不会阻止它们接收到数据源的更改。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event, so calling will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source. 出于此原因，这并设计用于简单绑定控件，如控件。For this reason, this and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者你可以使用这些方法在复杂绑定方案中，则禁止显示如果通过设置事件属性设置为`false`。Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法回滚之前添加到集合中指定的索引处的项的挂起的添加`position`。The method rolls back a pending addition of an item previously added to the collection at the index specified by `position`. `position`参数是必需的因为几个新项可能同时挂起。The `position` parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
